synopsis.text: My-Otome's prequel dives into the beginnings of two powerful women: Lena Sayers, the former wielder of the Lofty Crimson Jade and Blue Sky Sapphire GEM, and Sifr Fran, the ex-queen of Windbloom Kingdom. The series also explores the origins of Schwartz, Aswad, and the prestigious Garderobe Academy, along with its Five Columns. When Sifr is kidnapped, Lena's hidden GEM abilities are revealed, setting the stage for a dramatic turn of events that will shape their destinies and those around them. Witness the untold story of Lena and Sifr as they navigate through a world filled with danger, loyalty, and unexpected alliances.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
